mainText:
Just heard the very sad news of Steve Job's passing. My sincere condolences go out to his wife and children....it's never easy when you lose a loved one.
 Steve Job's was truly an amazing human being...His legacy will forever live
 on. My prayers are with your family and may they find the strength during this very difficult time. My they find comfort in knowing that you have made an unforgettable imprint on our every day lives. Godspeed and may you RIP Steve...you will be missed, but never forgotten!
author: Joey
